channel.title: Just War on Luke M Perez
channel.description: Recent content in Just War on Luke M Perez

item.title: The Irony of Technological Warfare
item.description: Reinhold Neibuhr’s critique of Natural Law just war theory informs our understanding of the complications posed by the use of drones and other autonomous technology in war

item.title: Unjustified Destruction: A case from Star Wars
item.description: The destruction of Alderaan was not Justified Sony Bunch is wrong (this time).
